extendedInfo.description: UPDATED! Upward Mobilityâs CompTIA A+ Essentials 220-701 Exam Prep app for Android is a valuable tool to help you achieve the valuable CompTIAâs A+ certification. Each of the 187 simulated exam questions is paired with an explanatory answer and a Key Takeaway. Key Takeaways are designed to ensure that the crucial learning point of the question is mastered as well as support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.This module covers all the topics on the 220-701 A+ Essentials exam, including:Hardware,Security,Networking, andOperating Systems.What is the CompTIA certification?The CompTIA 220-701 A+ Essentials exam is an international, vendor-neutral certification designed to measure the necessary competencies of an entry-level IT professional. The exam measures your ability to support computers and install, configure, troubleshoot, optimize, diagnose and perform preventive maintenance in the field or in organizations.This app is not affiliated with CompTIA.Upward Mobility apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.About Upward MobilityUpward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.title: Crash app
reviews.comment: App wont work. Uninstall and reinstalled this app. Everytime i try to use it the app is not responding. Please fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incompatible?
reviews.comment: This app is showing as incompatible with my HTC Sensation with ICS.  what gives guys?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: With the glaring issues this app has, it should be free.  Some questions show incorrect on correct and vice versa.  There are better practice tests for free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: -Passed 701 -Failed 702 -downloaded this app -am studying from it tonight :Let\'s see if I pass my retest tomorrow. *update.. I PASSED!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app to study for the A+ exam. Please add more questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some errors
reviews.comment: Who proofed this? Grammar and spelling errors. On some questions, say the Answer is C, but its says its A. Then when u get the explanation,  its talks about the answer C!! That\'s an a big issue. Needs an update! !
reviews.author: A Google User
